original_text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up, even from the dead; from whence also he received him in a figure.
korean_text: 그가 하나님이 능히 이삭을 죽은 자 가운데서 다시 살리실 줄로 생각한지라 비유컨대 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 도로 받은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 살리실 수 있음을 생각하며

sentences.original_text: from whence also he received him in a figure
